Literature Review: Irmgard Flügge-Lotz was a pioneering figure in fluid mechanics, making significant contributions to the field of flow computation, compressible boundary layers, and aerodynamics control theory. Her work had a lasting impact on the development of fluid mechanics, and her legacy continues to inspire researchers today. This literature review aims to provide an overview of Flügge-Lotz's life, work, and contributions to fluid mechanics, highlighting her achievements and the significance of her research.
